titleStmt.title: The history of passive obedience since the Reformation
titleStmt.author: Seller, Abednego, 1646?-1705.

notesStmt.note: "A continuation of the history of passive obedience" published in 1690, is filmed first on reel.
Attributed to Abednego Seller. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library and Yale University Library.
Imperfect: last 55 p. lacking on film.
